attributes.action: make it law so all soft drink manufacturers may not have any more than 20% sugar in thier drinks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Did you know that a majority of manufacturers of soft drinks have a high amount of sugar in thier drinks. Most have 40% sugar but there are a few who have even more. One drink ive seen has 48% sugar. Thats nearly half all the content in the drink. A law should be made so that these mufacturers cannot put anymore than 20% sugar in any of the drinks they produce
